options.name: Dualwielder
options.description: Gain the Dual Wielding Stance which allows you to Equip a Light 1-Handed Melee Weapon weapon in your Offhand. Once per turn, you can make an Attack with your Offhand that does not consume an Action and does not apply your Damage Bonus Modifier.

options.name: Action : Disengaging Strike
options.description: You make an Attack with only your Offhand, using your Primary Weapon to fend off Attacks, granting you a +2 Dodge and Block until the end of your turn and allowing you to Immedietly move 3 Units.

options.name: Action : Synchronized Strike
options.description: Make an Attack with your Primary Hand. If the Attack hits, your next Offhand Attack until the end of your current turn has a +2 Attack Modifier and ignores Physical Mitigation.

options.name: Ambidextrous
options.description: You add your Weapon Damage Bonus Modifier to your Offhand Attacks.

options.name: Reaction : Cross Block
options.description: In response to being the Target of a Melee Attack, roll two Block Checks and take the higher of the two values. If the Attack is Botched, the Creature becomes Stunned.

options.name: Reaction : Dual Attack of Opportuntity
options.description: When a Creature leaves Area of Control, you can make an Attack of Opportunity with both your main and offhand Weapon.
